Title: For the Honor of the Name
Plot: Before our story opens two sisters had been in love with the same man and in the first scene we find the young sister poverty stricken and alone desperately ill. She writes to her sister for succor and is taken to their beautiful home in the country where she recovers her health. Two years pass and one day the younger sister, finding the wife keeping a rendezvous with a friend and learning that her brother-in-law knows of it, hurries to the place of meeting and takes her sister's place with intensely dramatic results.
